summary: Completed directives for order-2025-10-12-004: Shared glossary mirrored from High Command; field-exclusive terms documented under Toysoldiers Addenda (Daylands and Nightlands, Morningate, Alfa-Juliett Tiers, Field Maxim, Heartday and Heartnight, Heart of Darkness, Signal-Ack v1.0, Field-Report v1.0, Toysoldier Archetypes, Triumvirate)
